sentence.Network_en: Acaricidal activity of methanol extracts from 16 mangrove plants against Panonychus citri McGregor was determined.
sentence.Network_cn: 采用叶片残毒法测定了16种红树植物甲醇提取物对柑橘红蜘蛛的杀螨活性.

sentence.Network_en: Sensitive population of Panonychus citri ( McGregor ) was collected and treated with fenpropathrin in laboratory.
sentence.Network_cn: 采集桔全爪螨敏感种群,在室内用甲氰菊酯处理,以选育其抗药性.

list.abs: life table of panonychus ulmi experimental population under different temperatures ., 苹果全爪螨在不同温度下的实验种群生命表.
occurring rules of panonychus citri and its control strategies ., 柑橘全爪螨发生规律及防治措施.

baesInfo.translate_result: panonychus ulmi virus[医]榆树赤蟥杆状病毒
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
